data.title: Conclusion. Worst of dictators? The meaning of Benito Mussolini and Italian Fascism in the age of Trump and the populists
data.meta_description: Conclusion. Worst of dictators? The meaning of Benito Mussolini and Italian Fascism in the age of Trump and the populists was published in Mussolini and the Eclipse of Italian Fascism on page 248.
